title: Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata: Ai to Seishun no Service-kai
synopsis: Tomoya Aki, Megumi Katou, Eriri Spencer Sawamura, Utaha Kasumigaoka and Tomoya's cousin Michiru Hyoudou (all members of a doujin circle called Blessing Software) go out location scouting for their project, a video game. As Eriri attempts to get Megumi to act out a scenario for the main heroine, Utaha lures Tomoya away and forces him to act out a romantic scenario with her.
characters: ['Katou, Megumi', 'Kasumigaoka, Utaha', 'Sawamura, Eriri Spencer', 'Aki, Tomoya', 'Hyoudou, Michiru']
staff: [['Haruna, Luna', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Sawai, Miku', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Maruto, Fumiaki', ['Original Creator']], ['Misaki, Kurehito', ['Original Character Design']]]
